results.abstract: Getting a big group together this time of year can be a hassle. So spare everyone the endless phone notifications and email threads and try these methods instead.

results.title: New Zealand Blocks Huawei, in Blow to Chinese Telecom Giant
results.abstract: The announcement came a day after Papua New Guinea said it would uphold a deal with Huawei, illustrating the growing global divide over the risks of Chinese technology.

results.title: More Small Companies Avoid I.P.O.s, Sapping U.S. Economy’s Vitality

results.title: In Australia, a Sudanese Basketball League Finds Itself Sidelined by Racist Fears
results.abstract: The South Sudanese Australian National Basketball Association said it was forced to cancel a tournament after being unfairly linked to stories of gang violence.

multimedia.caption: The Savannah Pride team, made up of South Sudanese Australians, practicing in Blacktown, Australia, in 2017.

results.title: Crossing Antarctica: 7 Takeaways From the Solo and Unsupported Journey
results.abstract: Two men are separately trying to become the first to cross Antarctica alone and without help. Here’s what you need to know.

results.title: Joel Embiid Shines as the 76ers Rout the Knicks
results.abstract: Embiid had 26 points and 14 rebounds in his first game with his father, a colonel in the Cameroon military, in attendance.

results.title: Champions League: P.S.G. Steadies Itself With Win Over Liverpool
results.abstract: P.S.G. moved to second place in a tight Group C, while Messi scored one goal and set up another in Barca’s win over PSV.

results.title: Texans Win Eighth Straight After 0-3 Start
results.abstract: Deshaun Watson accounted for three touchdowns to help Houston continue its winning streak.
